column3: Traffic;(Kampong Speu):------ Electricity in Kampong Speu was cut on the morning of September 14
column5: Kampong Speu province.------According to Electric Kompong Speu
column6: the reason for the disruption is because a truck overturned into the low voltage line (LV). The Technical Working Group is working to restore the electricity to customers for renewal before 12:00 pm.------However
column7: EDC urges citizens to be vigilant when working close to electricity lines
column8: because they may cause disruption to electricity supply and accidental hazards to human life.------http://www.freshnewsasia.com/index.php/en/localnews/98999-2018-09-14-03-49-17.html
